item.title: NAGASE to present “healthy indulgence” at the IFT16, featuring TREHA® trehalose in energy drinks and donutsNAGASE to present “healthy indulgence” at the IFT16, featuring TREHA® trehalose in energy drinks and donuts
item.description: NAGASE, a leading innovator in food ingredients, will serve a grapefruit energy beverage and glazed donuts at IFT16, to highlight the multi-functionality of TREHA® trehalose in beverage and bakery applications. TREHA® is a unique, high performance food ingredient with consumer benefits for freshness, flavor, and texture. NAGASE will be at booth number #3817 at IFT16, held in Chicago from July 16-19, 2016.
